report.title: Filterable records by week
report.description: Counts records by week for the last year with standard params support.
report.query: select #columns# from generate_series(0,52) as weeks(no) left join cache_occurrences_functional o on date_trunc('week', o.created_on)=date_trunc('week', CURRENT_DATE - (weeks.no*7)) #agreements_join# #joins# where #sharing_filter# #idlist#

column.name: processed
column.sql: count(case when record_status in ('V','R','D') then o.id else null end)
